Counter-Strike прозванной 1.6 был изначально модом к первой Half-Life.
Когда мы были школьниками и у нас не было компов бы бегали в компьютерные клубы что бы поиграть в неё и тратили не мало денег для этого, когда в школе начиналась какая то разборка то мы всегда бежали в компьютерный клуб и играли в эту игру доказать что ты прав. Было так же не мало модов на неё (По типу Counter-Strike 1.7, Counter-Strike S.T.A.L.K.E.R. и т.д.). Многие считают Counter-Strike Gay Offensive самой топовой кс но это не так. Это игра классика и легенда.
Saudades das épocas de LAN, campeonatos, viva esse jogo que revolucionou o mundo dos games para pc, o primeiro game FPS de pc e o melhor já criado pela VALVE!!!

This is the game that started it all for me when it comes to PC gaming. When I was just 17 years old, I ran this game with just 512mb of ram and integrated graphics. I knew nothing about computers but that didn't matter. I loved the game for what it was and even the idea of talking to other players with a little desktop mic with a piece of tape stuck to the bottom of it fascinated me. Today, gamers take that stuff for granted, but I don't...not anymore. From the golden age of surf and every gamemode in-between, this version of Counter-Strike was the seed to a franchise that has stayed with me for over half of my life. While the franchise will continue to change, I will never forget it's roots and the special place that it became for me everyday after school. If you have never played Counter-Strike, consider this version if you are interested in something that will provide insight into how the game has become what it is today. Game on.
